Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class DefaultCreator

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.DefaultCreator
public class DefaultCreator
extends java.lang.Object
Class used if the player picks to use the default settings for leader and developer cards.

  • Method Details

    • produceDevCard

      public static java.util.ArrayList<DevCard> produceDevCard()
      Static method used for generate an array List containing all the defaults DevCard in the basic game settings. Once the method is called for the first time saves the cards in his attribute and the other calls will return the attribute.
      Returns:
      the array list containing all the DevCards.

    • produceLeaderCard

      public static java.util.ArrayList<LeaderCard> produceLeaderCard()
      Static method used for generate an array List containing all the defaults LeaderCards in the basic game settings
      Returns:
      the array list containing all the LeaderCards.

    • getGameRes

      public static java.util.ArrayList<Resource> getGameRes()
      Create all the Resources needed during a game.
      Returns:
      the ArrayList containing all the Resources

    • getDevFromID

      public static DevCard getDevFromID​(java.lang.String cardID)
      Receiving an devCardID returns the object DevCard
      Parameters:
      cardID - the card id
      Returns:
      the dev from id

    • getLeaderFromID

      public static LeaderCard getLeaderFromID​(java.lang.String cardID)
      Receiving an LeaderCard's ID obtains the respective LeaderCard object
      Parameters:
      cardID - the ID of the LeaderCard.
      Returns:
      the object LeaderCard.
